page.title: 12HOUSING-NORMANTON SPRINGS
page.content: The village of Normanton Springs on the Shirebrook has a core of late l9th century and early 20th century terraces along the main street. Some of the terraces have recently been demolished.The old village school has been converted into flats and there has been new development of semi-detached private housing.There are also large post war council housing developments to the south and north with sports grounds and parks around the large comprehensive school to the north.Future development plans are for a major link road which will cut through the site to the east.Some work has already commenced on this.To the west a former colliery spoil heap has been reclaimed for housing. Amenities for indoor recreation, shopping and medical facilities seem to be lacking.
